Package org.efaps.admin.datamodel.ui

This package contains classes responsable for the representation of types in an Userinterface.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IUIProvider
    TODO comment!
    IUIValue
    TODO comment!
    UIInterface
    Interface for all classes used to evaluate value for presentation in an user interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractUI
    Abstract class for the UIInterface interface implementing for all required methods a default.
    BitEnumUI
    TODO comment!
    BooleanUI
    A boolean value is shown in create mode with radio boxen which are only preselected if a defaultvalue for the attribute was defined.
    DateTimeUI
    Class to represent a DateTime for the user interface.
    DateUI
    Class to represent a Date for the user interface.
    DecimalUI
    Class used to represent any type of decimal for the UI.
    DecimalWithUoMUI
    Class to represent a String for the user interface.
    EnumUI
    TODO comment!
    FieldValue
    This class is used as the value for a field.
    FormatedStringUI
    Class to represent a String for the user interface.
    JaxbUI
    TODO comment!
    LinkWithRangesUI
    This Class is the representation of LinkWithRanges for the user interface.
    Depending on the access mode (e.g.
    NumberUI
    Class used to represent any type of number for the UI.
    NumberWithUoMUI
    Class to represent a String for the user interface.
    PasswordUI
    This class returns the different Html-Snipplets wich are needed for a PasswordType.
    RateUI
    TODO comment!
    StringUI
    Class to represent a String for the user interface.
    StringWithUoMUI
    Class to represent a String for the user interface.
    TypeUI
    Class to represent a Date for the user interface.
    UIValue
    Wrapper Class to get a value for a UserInterface.
    UserUI
    Class to represent a User for the user interface.

Package org.efaps.admin.datamodel.ui Description

This package contains classes responsable for the representation of types in an Userinterface.
